feature.label: Embedded Maven Runtime 3.0.3 with Aether 1.13
feature.description: Embedded Maven Runtime 3.0.3 with Aether 1.13 This is a patched maven 3.0.3 runtime, which includes aether 1.13. This solves a problem with dependency resolution. See here: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-5136 As m2e uses always the embedded maven runtime for dependency resolution, it is highly advised to install this runtime. If you have already installed Embedded Maven Runtime 3.0.3 from Sonatype, you have to uninstall it before installing this patch.
